label: uncl8273
comment: Code specifying a dangerous goods regulation.

values.label: European agreement on the international carriage of dangerous goods on road (ADR)
values.comment: European agreement on the international carriage of dangerous goods on road. ADR is the abbreviation of "Accord europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises dangereuses par route".

values.label: NDR European agreement for the transport of dangerous goods on the river Rhine
values.comment: European agreement giving regulations for the transport of dangerous goods on the river Rhine, officially known as: "Accord europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises dangereuses par navigation sur le Rhin.".

values.label: CA, Transport Canada's dangerous goods requirements
values.comment: Canadian transport of dangerous goods requirements as published by Transport Canada in the Canadian Gazette, Part II.

values.label: JP, Japanese maritime safety agency dangerous goods regulation code
values.comment: Regulation regarding the handling of dangerous goods on vessels issued by Japanese maritime safety agency.

values.label: MARPOL 73/78
values.comment: International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating.

values.label: GHS regulation
values.comment: The United Nations Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals.

values.label: Transport emergency (TREM) card
values.comment: A card providing details on procedures for emergencies during transportation according to ADR.

values.label: IBC Code
values.comment: The international Code for the Construction and Equipment of Ships carrying Dangerous Chemicals in Bulk

values.label: IGC Code
values.comment: The International Code of the Construction and Equipment of Ships Carrying Liquefied Gases in Bulk

values.label: IMSBC Code
values.comment: The International Maritime Solid Bulk Cargoes Code

values.label: MARPOL Annex I
values.comment: The International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (MARPOL) - Prevention of Pollution by Oil

values.label: DE, ADR and GGVS combined regulations for combined transport
values.comment: Combined German and European regulations for the transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European roads. ADR means: Accord Europeen relatif au Transport international des marchandises Dangereuses par Route. GGVS means: Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse.

values.label: ADNR, Autorisation de transport de matieres Dangereuses pour la Navigation sur le Rhin
values.comment: Regulations for dangerous goods transportation on the Rhine.

values.label: DE, ARD and RID - Combined regulations for combined transport
values.comment: Combined European regulations for the combined transportation of dangerous goods on roads and rails. ARD means: Autorisation de transport par Route de matieres dangereuses. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer.

values.label: US, 49 Code of federal regulations
values.comment: United States federal regulations issued by the US Department of transportation covering the domestic transportation of dangerous goods by truck, rail, water and air.

values.label: DE, ADR, RID, GGVS and GGVE - Combined regulations for combined transport
values.comment: Combined German and European regulations for the combined transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European roads and rails. ADR means: Accord Europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises Dangereuse par Route. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer. GGVS means: Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse. GGVE means: Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn.

values.label: DE, GGVE (Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn)
values.comment: German regulation for the transportation of dangerous goods on rail.

values.label: DE, GGVS (Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse)
values.comment: German regulation for the transportation of dangerous goods on road.

values.label: IATA ICAO
values.comment: Regulations covering the international transportation of dangerous goods issued by the International Air Transport Association and the International Civil Aviation Organization.

values.label: IMO IMDG code
values.comment: Regulations regarding the transportation of dangerous goods on ocean-going vessels issued by the International Maritime Organization.

values.label: DE, RID and GGVE, Combined regulations for combined transport on rails
values.comment: Combined German and European regulations for the transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European rails. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer. GGVE means: Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn.

values.label: Railroad dangerous goods book (RID)
values.comment: International regulations concerning the international carriage of dangerous goods by rail. RID is the abbreviation of "Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer".

values.label: UK IMO book
values.comment: The United Kingdom (UK) version of the International Maritime Organisation (IMO) book on dangerous goods.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Additional and/or other information for the transportation of dangerous goods which are mutually defined.
